attributes.action: boycott the China Olympics and not allow it to be shown on TV in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There has been speculation that the Red Arrows will not be allowed to perform at the 2012 London Olympics because it may be construed as too military and may offend some people.

The attitude of China offends me. It oppresses its own population and militarily threatens its neighbours such as Tibet and Taiwan. It is essentially a military dictatorship.

Allowing China to host the 2008 Olympics and have this splashed all over our media is a propaganda coup for a country which refuses basic rights to its own people and refuses free reporting of the truth about its behaviour.

To allow them such publicity legitimises this behaviour.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
